name: Rinse Repeat
description:
This game was created as an entry for Global Game Jam 2021 under 36 hours. Everything (except for music and skyboxes) there was produced by a single person - me. You have been warned.

Rinse Repeat | Global Game Jam

Lost socks go somewhere, don't they? Much like many other things they get lost in other worlds. And, naturally, laundry is one of the many gateways into those other places. Does it make sense? Probably not. Find items that other people lost ages ago. Approach the washing machine, and it will take you from there. When you've found what you've been looking for, get back to the awkwardly placed washing machine. You may need to visit the same place multiple times. Try not to fall or swim. If you are really walking around aimlessly, consider enabling hints.
